channel.title: The Times of India Sports: Extensive sports coverage, key statistics and free downloads
channel.description: The Times of India Sports gives you latest sports coverage, scores and milestones; covers all sporting events, provides key statistics and free downloads

image.title: The Times of India Sports: Extensive sports coverage, key statistics and free downloads

item.title: Words of advice from Viv helped: Viru
item.description: Delhi Daredevils snapped their six-game losing streak just a day after Vivian Richards joined them as advisor and Sehwag credited the legendary West Indian.

item.title: Djokovic ends Nadal's eight-year reign
item.description: Novak Djokovic ended Rafael Nadal's dreams of a record ninth successive Monte Carlo Masters title with a 6-2, 7-6 (7/1) victory in the final on Sunday.

item.title: Early blows rattle KXIP in chase of 186
item.description: Kings XI Punjab got off to a disastrous start while chasing a massive 186 as they were two down with just five runs on board in the IPL clash.

item.title: IPL 6: Pune Warriors set 186 for Punjab
item.description: Brilliant contribution from the top order and sizzling show by Luke Wright powered Pune Warriors to a massive 185/4 against Kings XI Punjab in Mohali.

item.title: IPL 6: Finch falls after fiery knock
item.description: Pacer Manpreet Gony got rid of Aaron Finch after his swashbuckling 65 (42) that set the tone for a big total by Warriors against Punjab in the IPL clash.

item.title: IPL: Finch slams fifty as PWI eye big total
item.description: Parvinder Awana gave Punjab first breakthrough by dismissing Robin Uthappa (37) after a solid 83-run opening stand with Aaron Finch in the IPL clash.

item.title: IPL 6: Pune Warriors off to a good start
item.description: Aaron Finch and Robin Uthappa gave Pune Warriors a flying start as they took the side cross 50-mark in 6.1 overs after being invited to bat by Kings XI Punjab.

item.title: IPL 6: Pune Warriors off to a good start
item.description: Aaron Finch and Robin Uthappa gave Pune Warriors a flying start as they took the side cross 50-mark in 6.1 overs after being invited to bat by KXIP.

item.title: Spurs fightback tips title towards United
item.description: Tottenham plundered three late goals to stun defending champions Manchester City 3-1 and leave Manchester United on the brink of the EPL title.

item.title: Sebastian Vettel wins Bahrain Grand Prix
item.description: Sebastian Vettel extended his lead in this year's title race when he claimed an impressive victory for Red Bull in an incident-filled Bahrain Grand Prix.

item.title: Viru, Mahela power Delhi to maiden win
item.description: Flashy knocks by Sehwag (95*) and Jayawardene (59) guided Delhi Daredevils to register their maiden victory as they crushed Mumbai Indians by 9 wickets.

item.title: Viru, Mahela slam 50s as Delhi cruise
item.description: Chasing a 162-run target, Delhi Daredevils took full control of the match as openers Sehwag, Jayawardene hit fifties in their IPL 6 match at Feroz Shah Kotla.

item.title: Viru, Mahela slam 50s as Delhi cruise
item.description: Chasing a 162-run target, Delhi Daredevils took full control of the match as openers Sehwag, Jayawardene hit fifties in their IPL 6 match at Feroz Shah Kotla.

item.title: Sehwag's fifty puts Delhi in firm control
item.description: Chasing a 162-run target, Delhi Daredevils surged forward in tremendous fashion as opener Virender Sehwag slammed a half century in their IPL 6 match.

item.title: Delhi off to good start against Mumbai
item.description: Chasing a 162-run target, Delhi Daredevils openers Mahela Jayawardene and Virender Sehwag gave the hosts good start in their IPL 6 match in Delhi.

item.title: Rohit, Sachin power Mumbai to 161/4
item.description: A scintillating stand between Rohit Sharma and Sachin Tendulkar proved to hot for Delhi to handle as Mumbai set a 162-run target in their IPL 6 match.

item.title: Rohit, Tendulkar power Mumbai to 161/4
item.description: A scintillating stand between Rohit Sharma and Sachin Tendulkar proved to hot for Delhi to handle as both players reached their fifties in their IPL 6 match.

item.title: Rohit, Sachin slam 50s as Mumbai cruise
item.description: A scintillating stand between Rohit Sharma and Sachin Tendulkar proved to hot for Delhi to handle as both players reached their fifties in their IPL 6 match.

item.title: Tsegaye Kebede wins London Marathon
item.description: Tsegaye Kebede won the London Marathon for the second time on Sunday amid enhanced security in the first major race since the twin bombings in Boston.

item.title: Tendulkar, Rohit revive Mumbai innings
item.description: Sachin Tendulkar and Rohit Sharma's steady partnership helped revive Mumbai's innings after they suffered early losses in their IPL 6 match in Delhi.

item.title: IPL: Mumbai lose Smith, Karthik early
item.description: After a cautious start to the innings, Mumbai Indians lost opener Dwayne Smith and Dinesh Karthik cheaply in their IPL 6 match at the Feroz Shah Kotla.

item.title: IPL: Mumbai Indians lose Smith early
item.description: After being put into field, Delhi Daredevils got their first victim when Roelof van-der Morwe struck to dismiss Dwayne Smith early in their IPL 6 match in Delhi.

item.title: Richards advises Daredevils to have faith
item.description: Delhi Daredevils had a piece of advice from team's new advisor Viv Richards, who said the beleaguered outfit must "have faith" and be "solid in mind" in IPL.

item.title: Mumbai elect to bat against Daredevils
item.description: Mumbai Indians skipper Ricky Ponting won the toss and decided to bat against Delhi Daredevils in their IPL 6 match at the Feroz Shah Kotla in Delhi.

item.title: Sachin is India's Don Bradman: Hayden
item.description: Former Aus opener Matthew Hayden placed Sachin Tendulkar above the game itself and called him India's Don Bradman and a "movement in himself".
